thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: MetLife to provide pension benefits to 41,000 FedEx retirees through annuity

title: MetLife to provide pension benefits to 41,000 FedEx retirees through annuity
text:
May 8, 2018 / 8:45 PM / Updated 2 hours ago MetLife to provide pension benefits to 41,000 FedEx retirees through annuity Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 8 (Reuters) - MetLife Inc has entered into an agreement to provide pension benefits for about 41,000 FedEx Corp retirees and beneficiaries, through a group annuity, the insurer said on Tuesday.
The FedEx group annuity deal, which MetLife expects will close on May 10, includes about $6 billion in pension obligations, the insurer said. (Reporting by Suzanne Barlyn; Editing by Lisa Shumaker)
